name: Another Zombie Simulator
description:
Hi, this is my first project posted in here. It's only a prototype of an idea I had some time ago. It started as a study project using some assets from Mixamo and some assets and materials from some packages given by Epic Games, so my intent isn't selling this as a full game, just sharing some of my abilities. It's not yet finished and it's not yet polished as well.

It's my first time making a project all by myself (while trying to learn new things) and it has been a fun experience! I intend to make more levels (currently it has only one) with some platforming challenges to it as well.

It was made with Unreal Engine 4, using some assets I got for free and some of them I made myself, using Blender. 

Like I said, it's more like a project intended for studying and sharing some of my abilities, but you are free to donate if you want to incentivize an upcoming indie developer to continue developing.

Thanks if you are downloading this to try out, sorry if it isn't what you expected and if you wanna give me feedback, my twitter is @JackBarboza4, you can DM me there and I'll be happy to answer!
